query:
ALTER TABLE members 
ADD COLUMN emergencyContactName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN emergencyContactPhone VARCHAR(32),
ADD COLUMN emergencyContactRelationship VARCHAR(128),
ADD COLUMN allergies TEXT,
ADD COLUMN medications TEXT,
ADD COLUMN photoConsent BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN smsConsent BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN liabilityWaiverSigned BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN liabilityWaiverSignedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN liabilityWaiverSignatureData TEXT;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2HuJQ2ACAAzqLGn.root --database SMbEjvRKS9YWLQQQ74RCcL --execute ALTER TABLE members 
ADD COLUMN emergencyContactName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN emergencyContactPhone VARCHAR(32),
ADD COLUMN emergencyContactRelationship VARCHAR(128),
ADD COLUMN allergies TEXT,
ADD COLUMN medications TEXT,
ADD COLUMN photoConsent BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN smsConsent BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN liabilityWaiverSigned BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN liabilityWaiverSignedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN liabilityWaiverSignatureData TEXT;
